title: meet me at red dragon
body:
chapter fifteen

rating: m

words: 5.4k 

summary: phil lester is a single 31 year old with a wild eight year old, ethan. dan howell is single 27 year old with a quiet five year old, noah. when they meet at their son’s swim lessons, for some reason phil can’t get the pretty brown eyed stranger out of his head.

read on ao3

start from the beginning

blog.description: My name's Dylan (they/them) and this is where I shove all my bullshit. Mainly it's those curly haired gay men (pictured above) and shitposts so if you're into those things then here ya go. I don't trust you all with the url of my one directon sideblog but it's out there. Header by @lemonheadlester.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: IDB is a shitfest, really. Sometimes it's good for laughs. But most of the time the cringe and ridiculousness on there are too...
question: IDB is a shitfest, really. Sometimes it's good for laughs. But most of the time the cringe and ridiculousness on there are too much to handle. Gaslighting? Homophobia? All because he was denying phan lol.
answer: Someone tried to explain why they didn’t think it was homophobia and got accused of mansplaining. I am a woman who has spent the past four years working for other women in STEM and have seen mansplaining. It exists, but that was not it. Just like the that person was trying to say the accusations against Dan were cheapening the term homophobia, I’m going to go ahead and say the accusations of mansplaining just because someone brought up points another didn’t like, harms the credibility of people speaking out against actual sexism. It’s one thing for them to not care about the effect their behaviors have on Dan and Phil and the horrible example those of them who pride themselves on being ‘mature members of the phandom’ are setting, but quite another to try to wrap it up in social justice terminology and place themselves on a morally superior level to Dan and Phil and everyone else. Just gross. Why did I torture myself by looking in the first place???

reblog.comment: Someone tried to explain why they didn’t think it was homophobia and got accused of mansplaining. Just like the that person was trying to say the accusations against Dan were cheapening the term homophobia, I’m going to go ahead and say the accusations of mansplaining just because someone brought up points another didn’t like, harms the credibility of people speaking out against actual sexism. It’s one thing for them to not care about the effect their behaviors have on Dan and Phil and the horrible example those of them who pride themselves on being ‘mature members of the phandom’ are setting, but quite another to try to wrap it up in social justice terminology and place themselves on a morally superior level to Dan and Phil and everyone else. Just gross. Why did I torture myself by looking in the first place???

I am a woman who has spent the past four years working for other women in STEM and have seen mansplaining. It exists, but that was not it. Just like the that person was trying to say the accusations against Dan were cheapening the term homophobia, I’m going to go ahead and say the accusations of mansplaining just because someone brought up points another didn’t like, harms the credibility of people speaking out against actual sexism. It’s one thing for them to not care about the effect their behaviors have on Dan and Phil and the horrible example those of them who pride themselves on being ‘mature members of the phandom’ are setting, but quite another to try to wrap it up in social justice terminology and place themselves on a morally superior level to Dan and Phil and everyone else. Just gross. Why did I torture myself by looking in the first place???
trail.content: Someone tried to explain why they didn’t think it was homophobia and got accused of mansplaining. I am a woman who has spent the past four years working for other women in STEM and have seen mansplaining. It exists, but that was not it. Just like the that person was trying to say the accusations against Dan were cheapening the term homophobia, I’m going to go ahead and say the accusations of mansplaining just because someone brought up points another didn’t like, harms the credibility of people speaking out against actual sexism. It’s one thing for them to not care about the effect their behaviors have on Dan and Phil and the horrible example those of them who pride themselves on being ‘mature members of the phandom’ are setting, but quite another to try to wrap it up in social justice terminology and place themselves on a morally superior level to Dan and Phil and everyone else. Just gross. Why did I torture myself by looking in the first place???

blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: Reading IDB makes me hope Dan never comes back to YouTube. He deserves better than to have perfection demanded by him from...
body: Reading IDB makes me hope Dan never comes back to YouTube. He deserves better than to have perfection demanded by him from people who slander and otherwise abuse him any time he has the audacity to act as his own person and not as their plaything. What kind of toxic entitlement must you have to accuse a stranger of gaslighting you with regards to their own life and personal relationships? How lacking in self-awareness must you be to have the ability to do this with a clear conscience while also stalking said stranger’s private residence, among other things?

summary: Hello! So today, I’m doing something that made me very, incredibly soft. And that’s when Phil takes Dan’s picture at the...
body:
Cute Coupley Analysis- Episode 9

Hello! So today, I’m doing something that made me very, incredibly soft. And that’s when Phil takes Dan’s picture at the beach

Quick Thoughts: I don’t know what it is about this, but something about it is just so damn soft and cute. Literally, Phil just took a cute picture and it makes my heart all warm and fuzzy

So anyways, they’re at the beach, and Dan poses for Phil by tilting his head as Phil gets a picture of Dan with the ocean and a beautiful sunset behind them

Something that I noticed really quickly is that Dan bends his head sideways and than looks away from the camera, like he isn’t sure how to pose. This means Phil probably grabbed him, put him there and said he’s taking pictures of him. Another thing that tells me this is how Tom starts laughing at Dan, like he knows how awkward Dan’s being in that moment. Maybe Dan whines before this and Phil said just try to look natural and Dan can’t. And Dan also starts blushing and getting all bashful, but we’ll get to that when we get to that

And Phil takes the pictures and Dan’s clearly not asking for the pictures to be taken, and it just makes me wonder how much Phil sees something pretty and puts his pretty boy in front of it to take pictures because yes it’s pretty but Dan will always be prettier, so he Phil must want pictures of the prettiest thing in the world (Dan) in front of pretty settings. What kind of super fond “the view’s pretty, but I think he’s prettier” bullshit is that?

And look at Dan. LOOK AT DAN! He gets SO bashful! That head shake is the most adorable thing I’ve ever seen and you see his cheeks start to turn red. That smile is so shy and cute, and when Phil ignores him and continues taking pictures, he does another bashful head shake and it’s just so cute! The fact Dan gets so blushy and shy because his boyfriend wants to take pictures of him is the most adorable thing

And as soon as Dan starts getting embarrassed and bashful, Phil legit QUICKLY focuses the camera and takes the pic. We can’t see but he must look so fond. Maybe that fond look is why Dan shakes his head the second time and gets even more bashful

And what makes this even more adorable? Phil never posts these pics. He decides to keep this cute, shy pictures of Dan all to himself, for him and him only to adore. And that’s so sweet

summary: imagine (a world like that) - Series Masterpost
title: imagine (a world like that) - Series Masterpost
body:
Total Wordcount: 27.3k, 14 total fics

Rating: E

Genre/tags: Songfics, POV Second Person, Introspection, Smut, Depression, Hurt/Comfort

Summary:  “ A decade long relationship, described in songfics. A love letter made up of 14 oneshots, from 2009 to 2019, written in 2nd person.“ 

A series inspired by Ariana Grande’s album sweetener” 

Link to the complete series: https://archiveofourown.org/series/1264055

A huge thank you to @agingphangirl and @phanbliss - for reading, commenting, giving me advices and generally supporting me through the writing process <3

– Link to Individual fics, in order: 

you make me say (oh, oh) -  Dan’s POV,  2.3k, Timeless, E. Inspired by sweetener

won’t you give me (a bit of your time) - Phil’s POV, 2k, 2009, T. Inspired by borderline

you’re such a dream (to me) - Dan’s POV, 1.7k, 2009. T. Inspired by R.E.M

once I have you (never let you go) - Phil’s POV, 1.8k, 2009, G. Inspired by blazed

say goodnight (and go) - Dan’s POV, 2k, 2010, E. Inspired by goodnight n go

I go back (to you) - Phil’s POV, 2.2k, 2012, G. Inspired by everytime 

better off (not being around ya) - Dan’s POV, 2.2k, 2013, M. Inspired by better off

give back (everything the darkness stole) - Undefined POV, 1.2k, 2014, G. Inspired by light is coming

you tell me everytime (just keep breathin’) -  Dan’s POV, 1.3k, 2015, G. Inspired by breathin

just to hug you (I’ll be there) - Phil’s POV, 2k, 2016, G. Inspired by get well soon

you love it (how I move) - Dan’s POV, 2.1k, 2018, E. Inspired by God is a woman

so young and beautiful (and so successful) - Phil’s POV, 2.3k, 2019, T. Inspired by successful 

I’m lovin’, I’m livin’ (I’m pickin’ it up) - Dan’s POV, 2.3k, 2019, G. Inspired by no tears left to cry

my whole life (got me ready for you) - Phil’s POV, 1.4k, Timeless, M. Inspiredy by pete davidson

summary: Happy Valentines Day Everyone!! I got to collab with the hella talented @neondnp to make these little guys!!! Im so proud of how...
body: Happy Valentines Day Everyone!! I got to collab with the hella talented @neondnp to make these little guys!!! Im so proud of how well we were able to make them and it was so much fun to bring them to life!! We colored each other lineart and you can see Alexis’ lineart over in her page bc they are so cute and perfect!!! Thank you again for reaching out to me to help make these bc im v proud of them and us!! 💕💗💞
